div.h2: Technical (Engineering) Project Manager - Apple Customer Systems

li.title: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Join Apple's Customer Systems organization as a Lead Developer. This is a great opportunity for some one to be a part of building one of the world's best CRM system from ground up. We are looking for a highly motivated individual to create innovative and scalable solutions, who is passionate about quality and has a keen eye for details.

ul.li: Experience managing global projects in web based technology environments
Solid knowledge of web and services applications development and architecture.
Significant experience in high availability infrastructure and operations processes.
Strong experience in developing projects using Java, Javascript, CSS, HTML, XML, Web Services, SQL and NoSQL Databases
Extensive experience with applications design, integration and deployment in an integrated global environment with focus on solutions for high volume consumer-oriented web sites
Solid understanding of principles of project management
Must be able to brainstorm and communicate technology ideas and issues with peers and IT management
Excellent communication, leadership and presentation skills
Excellent organizational, systems analysis and documentation skills

div.p: Drive the end to end execution of software development throughout the product development lifecycle and ensure on time delivery. Manage multiple projects, setting priorities with measurable objectives, monitoring and reporting on the process, progress and results Lead technical development; Review deliverables for accuracy and completeness. Effectively communicate project status to the senior management and business partners on a regular basis. Provide leadership and expertise to define solutions architecture for next generation web solutions with high performance and scalability Partner with consumers to ensure their expectations are met and managed Institutionalize best practices for IT applications development and project management to ensure consistent delivery of quality application solutions Keep up-to date on latest technology solutions in market to generate innovative ideas to solve business challenges
BA/BS in Computer Science or related field with 10+ years of overall experience Project Management certification a plus
